thread.title: In Trump they trust
thread.title_full: In Trump they trust | The Economist

author: guest-ajammnjs
text:
"It's Getting Better All The Time" - The Beatles
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y925oc8bnOs
-
Several of Donald Trump's Latino advisors resign after his immigration speech
"CBS News reported Thursday that 15 of nearly two dozen members on the council had resigned."
http://www.latimes.com/nation/politics/trailguide/la-na-trailguide-updat...
-
Getting Into the Taco Truck Business Takes More Than a Clinton Win
"On Thursday night on MSNBC, Latinos for Trump co-founder Marco Gutierrez warned of the impending hordes of Mexican food truck operators should Hillary Clinton win the presidency."
" "My culture is a very dominant culture," he told a flummoxed Joy Ann Reid, guest host on All In With Chris Hayes. "And it's imposing, and it's causing problems. If you don't do something about it, you're gonna have taco trucks every corner." "
http://www.nbcnews.com/business/economy/getting-taco-truck-business-take...
NSFTL
Regards
